name: Pacbase: Avoid Online Programs using COB  GOTO statement
description: The COB statement is used to implement particular statements as : `!xA!`. Debranching statements (to be avoided)`!xA!`. Cobol statements not available with Pacbase (to be avoided as not portable)`!xA!`. Specific instructions related to the hardware or software environment (thus not portable)`!xA!`The COB  GOTO statement should be avoided
output: Nb of online program using COB GOTO`!xA!`Value : Nb of COB GOTO in the program
